name: asdf
description: Extendable version manager with support for Ruby, Node.js, Elixir, Erlang & more
install: mkdir -p $HOME/.asdf && cp -R * $HOME/.asdf/ && echo ''; echo 'Add the following:'; echo '. $HOME/.asdf/asdf.sh'; echo '. $HOME/.asdf/completions/asdf.bash'; echo 'to your .bashrc (or .bash_profile) file and then launch new shell'
